[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1453450201221{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”MANUFACTURING” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”title”][vc_column_text]The OTAE family of companies not only supports the industries they serve, but also advance and improve them through ongoing research and development. At OTAE, we are not simply content to support our customers, we strive to play a key role in their continual success.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”7/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”SERVICE DETAILS” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”title”][vc_column_text]The OTAE family of companies not only supports the industries they serve, but also advance and improve them through ongoing research and development. At OTAE , we are not simply content to support our customers, we strive to play a key role in their continual success.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1571568881944{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]OTAE specialize in diversification. The extraordinary variety of the work we perform attests to the can-do attitude that permeates through our organization.[/vc_column_text][vc_tta_accordion style=”anps-style-1″ shape=”square” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”ENERGY & POWER” tab_id=”1453278704996-2e48d0ff-944d”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1571569755694{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Energy & Power system study, design and audit
Transmission and distribution sub-station system
SAS, SCADA, Smart grid & protection system
Renewable & sustainable energy
Enterprise/Data center power system[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT” tab_id=”1453278708716-3462645a-c915″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1571569779638{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Embedded system design
Business automation/ERP
Customize utility control systems
Computer clouding[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”INDUSTRIAL PROCESS AUTOMATION & CONTROL” tab_id=”1453278719768-885e6062-5ba0″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1571569801279{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Oil & Gas process plant automation
Water automation
Heavy industrial automation
Building automation[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”INFRASTRUCTURE ENGINEERING” tab_id=”1453278719253-0a2170b7-7b6b”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1571569825479{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Design, consultancy, engineering and construction of civil, steel and electromechanical infrastructure
Energy efficient CHP con-generation process plant
CPS-G4 based green industries and commercial building
IT & Telecommunication infrastructure[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”MISSION” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”title”][vc_column_text]OTAE is a proud family of companies that produce a wide variety of innovative products for industry. With more than 150 direct and outsourcing employees, over 4 worldwide for development, manufacturing, sales and distribution facilities, we provide tier-one products and services to some of the most demanding industries imaginable.

This vast diversity of global resources and networking infrastructure allows us to utilize the strengths of each company, learn from each other and create a technological advantage within each industry. Common to every associate in our family of companies, is the profound respect for and the integrity of established industrial principles and practical openness to applications of new technology. With individual company histories spanning decades, and in two cases, more than a century, the OTAE company is time-tested leaders in their national and global markets.

Our client base is truly international with manufacturing, sales and distribution centers and we are confident in our ability to meet or exceed your needs. Our range of capabilities include design/build applications, field inspection and installation services, customer fabrication and large scale manufacturing services.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
